subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After Ben Zobrist singled to start the ninth, B.J. Upton hit an 0-1 pitch into the left-field seats for a 3-2 victory over the visiting Toronto Blue Jays on Tuesday night.
snippet: After Ben Zobrist singled to start the ninth, B.J. Upton hit an 0-1 pitch into the left-field seats for a 3-2 victory over the visiting Toronto Blue Jays on Tuesday night.
